title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\AutomatedAgentReply
name: AutomatedAgentReply
description:
Represents a response from an automated agent.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.AutomatedAgentReply

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.allow_cancellation
params.description: Indicates whether the partial automated agent reply is interruptible when a later reply message arrives. e.g. if the agent specified some music as partial response, it can be cancelled.

params.name: data.cx_current_page
params.description: The unique identifier of the current Dialogflow CX conversation page. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/agents/<Agent ID>/flows/<Flow ID>/pages/<Page ID>.
